title: Review Data Center Physical Security
description: An IT auditor performs a review of the physical security controls at the company's primary data center.

tasks.description: Review the data center access logs for the past 3 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor has the logs of all entries into the data center.

tasks.description: Compare the access logs to the list of authorized personnel to identify any unauthorized access.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms all access was by authorized individuals.

tasks.description: Perform a physical inspection to verify that security cameras are operational and fire suppression systems are tested regularly.
tasks.expected_outcome: The auditor confirms that the fire suppression system's last test was over a year ago, which violates the policy to test it semi-annually.
